      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getSessionIds(java.lang.String pmaControlURL, java.lang.String pmaCoreSessionID)
      This method is used to Retrieve a dictionary with currently defined training sessions in PMA.control The resulting dictionary use the session's identifier as the dictionary key, and therefore this method is easier to quickly retrieve and represent session-related data.

      This method is used to retrieve a list of currently defined training sessions in PMA.control

      This method is used to get version info from PMA.control instance running at pmacontrolURL

      • getSessions

        public static org.json.JSONArray getSessions(java.lang.String pmaControlURL,
                                             java.lang.String pmaCoreSessionID)
        This method is used to retrieve a list of currently defined training sessions in PMA.control

      • getSessionIds

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getSessionIds(java.lang.String pmaControlURL,
                                                                                                             java.lang.String pmaCoreSessionID)
        This method is used to Retrieve a dictionary with currently defined training sessions in PMA.control The resulting dictionary use the session's identifier as the dictionary key, and therefore this method is easier to quickly retrieve and represent session-related data. However, this method returns less verbose data than get_sessions()
        Parameters:
        pmaControlURL - URL for PMA.Control
        pmaCoreSessionID - PMA.core session ID
        Returns:
        Map of data related to registred session IDs

      • getCaseCollections

        public static org.json.JSONArray getCaseCollections(java.lang.String pmaControlURL,
                                                    java.lang.String pmaCoreSessionID,
                                                    java.lang.String... varargs)
        This method is used to retrieve all the data for all the defined case collections in PMA.control
        Parameters:
        pmaControlURL - URL for PMA.Control
        pmaCoreSessionID - PMA.core session ID
        varargs - Array of optional arguments

        project : First optional argument(String), default value(null), project case collections belong to

        Returns:
        Array of case collections

      • getCaseCollectionByTitle

        public static org.json.JSONObject getCaseCollectionByTitle(java.lang.String pmaControlURL,
                                                           java.lang.String pmaCoreSessionID,
                                                           java.lang.String caseCollection)
        This method is used to get a case collection by its title
        Parameters:
        pmaControlURL - URL for PMA.Control
        pmaCoreSessionID - PMA.core session ID
        caseCollection - The case collection's title
        Returns:
        The case collection in json object format
